entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to LeWin’s personal blog. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment var gitment = new Gitment({ // id: '页面ID', // 可选。默认为 location.href owner: 'LeWinCheng', repo: 'https://lewincheng.github.io', oauth: { client_id: '57f0000a9cf9df46f0c3', client_secret: 'af983206a45da29a131790baa0d076dbc8589de0', }, }) gitment.render('container')
